description: Listed Building Consent for repair, restoration and replacement works to the Listed Wall, involving: Removal of creepers and biological growth from brickwork carefully by hand; Removal of root growth to copings stones; Replacement of missing bricks; To areas of heavily spalled brickwork, carefully remove loose masonry by hand and repoint using lime based mortar; Where appropriate undertake colour and texture matched 'plastic repairs' in isolated areas to decayed brick faces where removal is not practical/likely to cause more damage, likely to be minor quantities only; Pin/stich cracks to coping stones; Repairs to coping stones with dressed natural stone to match the existing, reinstatement of those removed and cleaned; Replace defective flaunching in lime based mortar; Replacement of defective pointing using lime based mortar; Specialist cleaning of stone bands to two gate pillars -subject to trail cleaning; Redecoration of metal work; Temporary access to facilitate safe access for the works.
site_name: St Katharine's Dock Boundary Walls along East Smithfield and Thomas More Way, North of Ivory House, London
